New Records: Rookie wing Zaccharie Risacher, the number one overall pick in this past year’s draft, had a career-high 33 points and made six three-pointers.
Key Match Events: Karl-Anthony Towns scored 34 points and grabbed 16 rebounds.
The Hawks went on a 13-1 run near the end of the fourth quarter.
Atlanta had a +9 advantage in offensive rebounds and recorded seven more steals against a low-intensity Knicks defense.
